name: Michael
summary: I am a determined, hard-working individual with the zeal to accomplish any task or challenge I'm given, seeking to exceed expectations. In the next year, I plan to achieve a bachelor's degree in Environmental Technology and Management, and attain a job in the field of sustainable design and technologies.

experience.title: Store Manager / Assistant Store Manager / Replenishment Manager
experience.description: Aid Store Manager, Assistant Store Manager, Full-Time Replenishment Manager in day-to-day operations and planning; unload and stock store merchandise. Train new Replenishment associates. Employee of the Month (July).

experience.title: Customer Service / Store Operations
experience.description: Provided customer service on the sales floor, managed day/night-time associates and store operations. Trained and assessed new associates. Assumed position at Brier Creek, Raleigh, NC location in October 2015.

experience.title: Support Specialist
experience.description: Prepare cash registers, count money, and prepare documentation for the bank deposit. Manage cashiers in the morning.

experience.title: Sales Associate / Cashier
experience.description: Offer customer service and efficiently run a cash register.

education.degree: Associate of Science in Liberal Arts, Science and Mathematics
Bachelor of Science in Environmental Technology and Management
